ModMetaData.name: Alpha Vehicles - Age of Sail
ModMetaData.author: Sarg
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 9 sailing ships in three different tiers. Junk, Cog and Longship for Tier 0 (no research, no ship parts). Caravel, Pirate caravel and Sloop for Tier 1 (research plus ship parts needed). Frigate, Galleon and Brig for Tier 2 (secondary research plus morer advanced ship parts needed). <size=24>Issues</size>
No issues tracked
<size=24>Plans for the future</size>
More vehicles? Maybe!
<size=24>Credit</size>
Original 3D models used as reference: Cog: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/cog-4e4410f87bc64ea2ab2f5d3ea65a69c5 Longship: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/viking-drakkar-dae4af8855514be386fc5480105195ac Junk: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/junk-9439705696e043fd88d08085783c91db Caravel: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/caravel-ver-1-06f46ad618604a7db14a69d2e7279008 Sloop: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/sloop-7f9075dd4bd14a4ebeeb83647cf24224 Frigate: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/galleon-mayflower-multideck-ship-641793a8946e484bb7febee4f8437f55 Galleon: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/nao-victoria-galleon-ship-4b4d85651cde46478fc70177d30be296 Brig: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/brig-ship-68721ddcd324492188255449a5531e66
<size=24>Compatibility</size>
Should be compatible with any vehicle mods out there
<size=24>Changelog</size>
